member.name: T:JetBrains.UI.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.Resources.Strings.CouldNotInitializeTheBasicException_Text
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to initialize the basic exception reporting service. Should there be any startup failures, they will be silent.
{0}.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.Resources.Strings.ShowInExplorer_Text
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Show in Explorer.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetTextWrapping.WrapWithOverflow
member.summary: Line-breaking occurs if the line overflows beyond the available block width. However, a line may overflow beyond the block width if the line breaking algorithm cannot determine a line break opportunity, as in the case of a very long word constrained in a fixed-width container with no scrolling allowed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetTextWrapping.NoWrap
member.summary: No line wrapping is performed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetTextWrapping.Wrap
member.summary: Line-breaking occurs if the line overflows beyond the available block width, even if the standard line breaking algorithm cannot determine any line break opportunity, as in the case of a very long word constrained in a fixed-width container with no scrolling allowed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetVisibility.Visible
member.summary: Display the element.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetVisibility.Hidden
member.summary: Do not display the element, but reserve space for the element in layout.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.Common.JetVisibility.Collapsed
member.summary: Do not display the element, and do not reserve space for it in layout.

member.param: Goto-by-name model that provides data for the UI.

member.name: T:JetBrains.UI.ExceptionReport.ShellLessExceptionReporting
member.summary: Helpers for setting up exception reporting when the product shell is not running yet. User-interactive mode helpers.
An exception reporter which knows the static product details and can submit smth to the issue tracker.

member.name: M:JetBrains.UI.ExceptionReport.ShellLessExceptionReporting.CreateAndInstall(JetBrains.Lifetimes.Lifetime,JetBrains.Build.Serialization.SerializedValuesResolver)
member.summary: An exception reporter which knows the static product details and can submit smth to the issue tracker.

member.name: M:JetBrains.UI.ExceptionReport.ShellLessExceptionReporting.CreateAndInstallWithoutContext
member.summary: An exception reporter which does not have the product context or any components yet. Shows a primitive message box without the submit-to-tracker capability. Reports failures in creation of the context for the full reporter. We MUST NOT obey flag here: after we have the context, we push another exception reporter that obeys the flag, but startup-related errors are most likely FATAL and MUST be shown to the user. — NOTE: not necessarily deemed true in wave01

member.name: T:JetBrains.UI.PopupLayout.PopupWindowManager
member.summary: Manages the display, positioning, and destroying popup windows.

member.name: F:JetBrains.UI.PopupLayout.PopupWindowManager.myPopupWindows
member.summary: This must be an instance member.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.PopupLayout.PopupWindowManager.PopupWindows
member.summary: Gets the collection of popup windows currently active in the system. Some of them may be invisible.

member.name: M:JetBrains.UI.PopupLayout.PopupWindowManager.CreatePopupWindow(JetBrains.Lifetimes.LifetimeDefinition,System.Object,JetBrains.Application.UI.PopupLayout.IPopupWindowContext,JetBrains.Application.UI.WindowManagement.HideFlags,System.Boolean,JetBrains.Application.UI.PopupLayout.PopupWindowMutex)
member.summary: Shows a popup window, controls its location and position against the layouter, and destroys the form upon one of the predefined actions.
member.param: Defines the lifetime of the popup window. Could be terminated by this class in case the window is closed due to one of the conditions. Bind all of the layouters, window context, and per-popup-window additional resources to this lifetime.
A form to be shown as a popup window.
The owning context for the popup window.
Flags that identify when to destroy the form (or hide, if the has been overridden to ).
If True, sets the focus to the popup window when it's first shown. The default is True.
Specifies the popup window's identity group. Creates a new unique group if omitted.

member.summary: Shows a popup window, controls its location and position against the layouter, and destroys the form upon one of the predefined actions.
member.param: The limiting lifetime for the window session.
A form to be shown as a popup window.
The owning context for the popup window.
Flags that identify when to destroy the form.
What to do to the window if it should be hidden (e.g. when app is deactivated). By default, the popup window will be closed, and its resources freed.

member.summary: Shows a popup window, controls its location and position against the layouter, and destroys the form upon one of the predefined actions.
member.param: The limiting lifetime for the window session.
A form to be shown as a popup window.
The owning context for the popup window.
Flags that identify when to destroy the form.
What to do to the window if it should be hidden (e.g. when app is deactivated). By default, the popup window will be closed, and its resources freed.
